message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it'll be a valuable asset to your business.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I'm willing to consider $860,000 as a fair offer for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
